channel.title: Failed systemd unit
channel.description:
In testing my Workstation build, I checked for failed systemd units with:
> sudo systemctl --failed list-units
It returned the following:
> systemd-tmpfiles-setup.service loaded failed
Any idea what I could be doing wrong here? I've been scouring message boards for possible fixes, but to no avail.

item.title: Failed systemd unit
item.dc:creator: pookie
item.description:
Update:

I reverted to an old snapshot from before I tried installing GNOME, and the problem is non-existent. Not sure why GNOME would trigger this, but it must have because that’s literally the only variable.

Read full topic
